# Summary

We often want to display information to users, and ideally that would be displayed in a unified way across the app. On material design terms, we should have a [snackbar](https://material.io/components/snackbars/#anatomy).

# Motivation

Many plugins will want to display some text information to users, such as errors, warnings and other information. But if each plugin displays it in a different way, the user's experience is not as fluid. Having a central snackbar that can receive notifications from any plugin would be ideal.

# Describe alternatives you've considered

Currently, plugins are either displaying all their notifications on the console, or [opening dialogs](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/6f9adbf457e74e3a6269d1305f1e59030e3f541a/include/ignition/gui/qml/Main.qml#lines-278).

# Additional context

Additional references:

* Angular material's [snackbar](https://material.angular.io/components/snack-bar/overview)
* Polymer's [toast](https://www.webcomponents.org/element/@polymer/paper-toast/demo/demo/index.html)
